title: Why active civil society necessary for democracy

content.prompt: Many consider the existence of an active civil society to be supportive of and even necessary for democratization because

choices.label: groups within civil society promote the rights of the majority
groups in civil society tend to avoid political positions
within civil society people learn to express interests and negotiate with others to achieve common goals
civil society tends to create conditions of alienation, atomization, and opposition to authority
organizations in civil society tend to be revolutionary and thus will undermine an undemocratic regime

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
